name: Galactic Fever [BETA]
description:
What is Galactic Fever ?

Galactic Fever is an adventure game whose main character is Ayru, explore the world to advance in the adventure!

Your companion Lua is waiting for you to start the adventure!

Synopsis A technological adventure

Ayru, an innocent creature with amnesia, wakes up alone in the middl of a dying forest. Witnessing a nature drained by technological advances, she meets a small robot named Lua, who persuades her to restore the balance of their world at his side...

Explore an open world

Craft your way through a beautiful open world full of secrets. Pass through misty forests, lush grasslands and cold tundras. Discover the dark history of the island by solving puzzles in old ruins and on the treetops.
